attributes.title: Excitement followed by utter disappointment...
attributes.review: When I heard there was an app to keep up on the latest Trump administration news and information I was quite excited. I am always on the go and trying to get news at the same time. Sadly, this app took DECADES to download and when it finally did? My phone crashed and I had to plug it back in to get it to turn on again. There is also glitches when you try and add your mobile phone number to sign up and I am ALREADY signed up for the trump texts. Still supporting just definitely not with this app anymore #deleted

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: downloaded app. after it was installed my phone was completely done. It laggs and my phone just isn’t the same.also the space it takes up is not worth it. don’t waste time getting this. waste of time and phone space. worst app ever.

attributes.title: This app takes too long to load and too much space!!
attributes.review: So I decided to download this here app you see... and it took FOUREVER to download and I have the greatest internet ever. Like Sleepy Joe wishes he had this good of internet!! Took 3 HOLE days to download and takes up a hole gigabite of storage!! I need that space to store my furry porn thank you very much!! And I am only interested in the best furry porn, you think you have the good stuff, well you clearly haven’t seen mine! It’s almost as good as our Supreme Leader walking down that ramp! I’ve never seen anyone run that fast! Hussein Bolt who?? Speaking of Hussein! You guys remember Barrack Hussein Obama? How dare he try to give us free healthcare and not deport Dreamers!! Who does he think he is letting children who had no choice in the matter live and steal our jobs and tax money!?!!?? Send em all back to Wakanda or soemthing! Oh and now Mississippi is taking the confederate flag off of there flag!!??? Who do they think they are changing our history! You can’t change history! And these BLT protesters are just destroying everything! The other day they ripped down good ol Robert E Lee from his podium for what, owning slaves?? My family owned slaves but I don’t see nobody ripping down my mail box!! Y’all millennials should just leave that stuff where it is! This is freedom country and you can’t take away my freedom. Anyways my grandson is asking is what I’m typing so I gotta go now Karen. Say hi to the boys for me! 👐😽😽💩🇱🇷🇱🇷

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: If I could rate this app 0 stars I would. Not only did it take 420 hours to download but once it did it destroyed my phone. My screen would turn black and display a code that I couldn’t under stand. Don’t make my mistake and don’t download that app! It’s ✨🧚🏼‍♀️💗𝒯𝓇𝒶𝓈𝒽💗🧚🏼‍♀️✨
